CustomField.description: This field is checked automatically when the client is sent an email alert to complete the Buyer No Interest Survey. It is used to ensure a client receives the No Interest survey only once.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is checked automatically when the client is sent an email alert to complete the Buyer No Interest Survey. It is used to ensure a client receives the No Interest survey only once.
CustomField.label: Sent Buyer No Interest Survey
